description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Blast your way past the enemies of Christmas in this multiplayer shooter! Battle through over 20 levels of unique enemies to unlock new game modes. Only YOU can save Christmas!
